mapper.select: SELECT c.id, u.nickname as from_nickname, u.avatar, c.content, c.like_number, c.create_time FROM d_comment c INNER JOIN u_user u ON c.from_uid = u.id WHERE c.is_check = 1 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.from_uid, fu.avatar, fu.nickname as from_nickname, c.to_uid, tu.nickname as to_nickname, c.content, c.like_number, c.create_time FROM d_comment c JOIN u_user fu ON c.from_uid = fu.id JOIN u_user tu ON c.to_uid = tu.id WHERE c.is_check = 1 AND c.parent_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY c.create_time LIMIT 3

SELECT c.id, c.from_uid, fu.avatar, fu.nickname as from_nickname, c.to_uid, tu.nickname as to_nickname, c.parent_id, c.content, c.like_number, c.create_time FROM d_comment c JOIN u_user fu ON c.from_uid = fu.id JOIN u_user tu ON c.to_uid = tu.id WHERE c.is_check = 1 AND parent_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY c.id
